sets.name: Bulky Supporter
sets.description:
• The given EV spread, nature and Eviolite allow Murkrow to survive an Extreme Speed from a Swords of Ruin-boosted Choice Band Dragonite, then invests the remaining EVs in Special Defense.

These are sample sets as we work on proper analyses. Stay tuned!

sets.name: Rain Setter
sets.description:
• The given EV spread and nature allow Pelipper to outspeed Iron Bundle in Tailwind, then invests the remaining EVs into HP and Defense for maximum physical bulk.

This is a sample set as we work on proper analyses. Stay tuned!

sets.name: Redirection Support
sets.description:
• This EV spread and nature allow Amoonguss to survive two consecutive Make It Rain attacks from Choice Specs Gholdengo, then dumps the remaining EVs into Defense.

  • 28 Speed IVs allow Amoonguss to underspeed Brave nature Iron Hands and Kingambit inside of Trick Room but otherwise retains more Speed for use outside of Trick Room.

This is a sample set as we work on proper analyses. Stay tuned!

sets.name: Dual Screens
sets.description:
• The given EV spread and nature allow Grimmsnarl to survive a Swords of Ruin-boosted Extreme Speed from a Choice Band Tera Normal Dragonite, then invests the remaining EVs into Special Defense.

This is a sample set as we work on proper analyses. Stay tuned!

sets.name: Thanos
sets.description:
• The given EV spread prioritizes increasing Annihilape's special bulk, but retains enough Attack to OHKO Chi-Yu with Drain Punch and enough speed to move before Modest Pelipper.

This is a sample set as we work on proper analyses. Stay tuned!

sets.name: Bulky Attacker
sets.description: • The given EV spread, nature and Assault Vest allow Iron Bundle to survive a ruin-boosted Overheat from Chi-Yu and OHKO it in return with Hydro Pump while retaining enough speed to move before Meowscarada. Incidentally, the spread also allows Iron Bundle to survive a ruin-boosted Extreme Speed from a Choice Band Tera Normal Dragonite.

sets.name: Bulky Wall
sets.description:
• The given EV spread and nature allow Wo-Chien to survive a spread Heat Wave from Beads of Ruin-boosted Choice Specs Chi-Yu, then invests the remaining EVs into Defense.

This is a sample set as we work on proper analyses. Stay tuned!

sets.name: Bulky Utility
sets.description:
• This EV spread and nature ensures that Ting Lu always OHKOs Chi-Yu with Stomping Tantrum or Earthquake, and then uses the remaining EVs to maximize its special bulk.

This is a sample set as we work on proper analyses. Stay tuned!
